q0.question: Why does security evacuate the hotel?
q0.answer: ['because martin informed them that bomb is about to go off.']
q0.recall: Security evacuates the hotel because Liz had planted a bomb there and it was armed.
q0.vectordb: Security evacuates the hotel because Martin convinces them that there is a bomb about to go off. Liz had planted the bomb earlier as part of a plan to kill Bressler and blame it on Muslim extremists. Martin and Gina race to the hotel to stop the bomb, but Liz fails to disarm it and is killed in the explosion.

Martin and Gina race to the hotel to stop the bomb, but Liz fails to disarm it and is killed in the explosion.
